summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Next.js 16 project detail page fixes. All critical fixes implemented correctly: params.slug properly awaited (not undefined), supabaseServer used in server components, .maybeSingle() instead of .single(), admin API slug regeneration working. Frontend UI tests all passed.

design_issues.issue: Missing 'sizes' prop on Image components with fill=true

passed_tests: /projects/test1 shows 'Project Not Found' with slug 'test1' correctly displayed (not undefined)
Back-to-projects button successfully navigates to /projects page
Project list page loads without errors and shows filter controls (search input and category buttons)
[slug]/page.js properly awaits params before using slug value (lines 7, 28)
[slug]/page.js uses supabaseServer (not supabaseClient) for server-side fetching
Admin update API imports slugify and regenerates slug when name changes (lines 4, 19-20)
No horizontal overflow detected on any tested page
Not-found page styled consistently with brand (dark bg: rgb(11,11,11), gold button)
Params.slug resolution working correctly with multiple test slugs
API endpoints return proper authentication errors (401) when unauthorized
Home page and projects page load successfully without critical errors
